author: Transcend Inc.
name: @transcend-io/consent-manager-ui
description: Transcend Consent Manager reference consent UI

scripts.start: rm -rf dist/ && yarn build && concurrently 'WATCH=true yarn build' 'yarn live-server --host=localhost dist/'
scripts.start:local: rm -rf dist/ && yarn build && concurrently 'WATCH=true yarn build' 'yarn live-server --host=localhost dist/'
scripts.start:cm-test: rm -rf dist/ && yarn build:cm-test && concurrently 'WATCH=true yarn build:cm-test' 'yarn live-server --host=localhost dist/'
scripts.start:prod: rm -rf dist/ && yarn build:prod && concurrently 'WATCH=true yarn build:prod' 'yarn live-server --host=localhost dist/'
scripts.start:cm-test:local-css: rm -rf dist/ && yarn build:base && node scripts/inject-bundle-id.js --cm-test --local-css && concurrently 'WATCH=true yarn build:base && node scripts/inject-bundle-id.js --cm-test --local-css' 'yarn live-server --host=localhost dist/'
scripts.start:prod:local-css: rm -rf dist/ && yarn build:base && node scripts/inject-bundle-id.js --cm --local-css && concurrently 'WATCH=true yarn build:base && node scripts/inject-bundle-id.js --cm --local-css' 'yarn live-server --host=localhost dist/'
scripts.playground: yarn build:playground && concurrently 'WATCH=true yarn build' 'yarn live-server --host=localhost --open=./src/playground/index.html --mount=/src/playground/:./src/'
scripts.playground:local: yarn build:playground && concurrently 'WATCH=true yarn build' 'yarn live-server --host=localhost --open=./src/playground/index.html --mount=/src/playground/:./src/'
scripts.playground:cm-test: yarn build:playground:cm-test && concurrently 'WATCH=true yarn build:cm-test' 'yarn live-server --host=localhost --open=./src/playground/index.html --mount=/src/playground/:./src/'
scripts.playground:prod: yarn build:playground:prod && concurrently 'WATCH=true yarn build:prod' 'yarn live-server --host=localhost --open=./src/playground/index.html --mount=/src/playground/:./src/'
